colorTheory.description: This color palette combines a professional and modern feel with a touch of vibrancy.
colorTheory.mood: Elegant and professional with a hint of creativity and energy.
colorTheory.accessibility: The text colors have high contrast against the background for readability.
colorTheory.colorRelationships: The primary color (teal) is complemented by a clean white secondary color and accented with a vibrant gold. The success color provides a contrasting element while maintaining harmony within the palette.
